headline: Co-Founder & CTO at Powerhouse AI (YC W22)
summary: Experienced Head Of Research And Development with a demonstrated history of working in the facilities services industry. Skilled in Management, Deep learning, Computer vision, Robotics, Algorithms, and Commissioning. Strong research professional with a Master's degree focused in Electrical Engineering Specialization in Automation and Control from National University of Singapore.

experiences.title: Chief Technology Officer
experiences.description:
Al-vision productivity tool for warehouse workers📸

The Al-powered app gives your warehouse superpowers: from automatic counting of goods to scanning multiple labels on go to reading and reconciliation of (paper) documents.

Proven to streamline inbound, stocktake, cycle count, and outbound processes by up to 40% with end-to-end coverage.
Working with the world's largest companies and 3PLs and backed by investors like Y Combinator and
Entrepreneur First.

experiences.title: Head of Research And Development
experiences.description:
• Managed, mentored and lead a team to develop products and IoT devices for the FM Industry.
• Design and develop system architectures for A.I. centric smart integrated management solutions for the Facility management industry.
• Defined and managed the execution of the department business strategy including target definitions, growth areas and business plans.
• Create, maintain and manage departmental budget.
• Helped the company apply as well as pitch for different funding /Grant calls, also won a grant funding by NEA in 2019 (a grant call to develop security come cleaning robot). I solely designed, developed, and successfully completed the project before the official deadline.
link: https://www.businesstimes.com.sg/hub/sff-x-switch-2020/open-innovation-is-the-key-to-overcoming-covid-19-challenges
• Standardized processes and monitoring individual/team growth with respect to the project completion and task allocated to improve teams productivity by 15%
• Effectively interact with other departments & organizations (e.g.Operations, Sales, Purchasing, Marketing Customers and Suppliers)
• Set up processes for strategic product development, from developing a POC to MVP based on design thinking.

experiences.title: Research Development Software Engineer
experiences.description:
•	Security & Cleaning robot: Designed and developed a standalone security module for cleaning robots, based on PyTorch and modified Yolo architecture to improve FPS and reduce power consumption; with a 86% mAP over 42 classes integrated with ROS.  It mainly involves object classification, categorization, and human pose estimation to classify humans as suspicious/ lying down.
•	SMART clean: A deep learning model based on image segmentation, FRCNN and IR image segmentation to detect undesired substances that the robot cannot clean to improve the efficiency of cleaning by 6%.
•	Asset Inspection: Object detection and recognition with some preprocessing based on feature extraction, tracking and MobileNet SSD V2 for asset inspection for a ROS (robotics framework) to achieve 73% mAP @50%IoU.
•	Fire detection system: Fire detection from an RGB camera using FireNet as well as feature extraction on a model to recognize the optical flow of fire.
•	Evaluated and improvised DNN models on error analysis & cost. Developing an AI platform to integrate humans work orders and robots to improve the productivity of cleaning.
•	Developed a module to integrate and monitor the robots via AWS/GCP cloud.

experiences.title: Robotics Engineer Intern
experiences.description:
• Worked on the development of a new cleaning autonomous robot based on ROS framework. 
• Developed an algorithm to detect coffee stains. Built in Python using open CV and GL.Security surveillance features for real time object detection based on the Tensor Flow data set.
• Was a part of the operational R&D, also helped in maintenance and deployment.

experiences.title: Automation Engineer
experiences.description:
• Lead a team for development, testing, commissioning and troubleshooting of production control systems.
• Design and developed software automation control solutions based on PLC programming (Rockwell and Siemens) and HMI development for various food processing industries for various countries.
• Tested, commissioned and performed troubleshooting of production machine control systems.
• Performed project planning during the development phase of the project and successfully executed it by commissioning.
• Ensured the accuracy and reliability of instrumentation, GUI/SCADA, control and safety systems.
• Authored engineering documentation for timely maintenance and testing of system.

education.field_of_study: Electrical Engineering Specialization in Automation and Control

accomplishment_courses.name: Building Conversational Experiences with Dialog flow
Deep Learning A-Z™: Hands-On Artificial Neural Networks (Udemy)
Deep Learning Computer Vision™ CNN, OpenCV, YOLO, SSD & GANs
Deep Neural network tuning: Hyper parameter tuning, Regularization and Optimization

accomplishment_projects.title: ROS based obstacle avoidance system for Autonomous Surface Crafts
accomplishment_projects.description:
Developed a GPS navigation module and a camera-based obstacle avoidance system.
Working with a team of two PhD engineers to develop the fully autonomous navigation craft based on ROS platform with a single board computer (i.e. Nvidia Jetson TX2).

accomplishment_projects.title: Smart Water Distribution System (Company Funded Project)
accomplishment_projects.description: • This project was developed to reduce wastage of water by monitoring, paying for what you use, automating and making the user experience much simple in controlling their usage of water with just an SMS, in case some water supply is left on accidentally for a while. All of it developed on a centralized web platform with ATmega 32 used to control and monitor each house water supply.
